item.description: Change 'type' or 'strategy' above to try different Component Types, like Sequencer

items.content: Welcome to Exercise Finder!You can specify by the body part you want to use. What do you want to do?
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>

items.content: Welcome to Exercise Finder! I can take into account the equipment you have available. What do you want to do?
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>

items.content: Welcome to Exercise Finder! Choose based on the body part you want to strengthen. What do you want to do?

items.content: Welcome to Exercise Finder! Choose what equipment you want to work with. What do you want to do?
